section.title: VCF Builder
section.para: For more information regarding this project, please see the VCF Builder website and/or the VCF Builder SourceForge project page

The VCF would like to thank the following people for contributing time and effort to project:
Marcello Pietrobon Doug Tinkham Orhun Birsoy Dmitry Kononov Scott Pearson Ian Wallis Fraggle Mike Goebel Augusto Roman Abelardo Gutierrez Marcus Portmann jacmoe Ed Monjay kiklop Marc Weber Jess Thrysoee Alan Fischer ChrisKr Darko Miletic Vic Hargrave Tiziano Franzoi Ning Ke Endre Somogyi Bobby Ward Raghavendra Chandrashekara Chandra Penke Cesar Mello Henrique Sambiase Sorin Ionescu
If we missed someone please let us know about it!

We'd also like to give credit where credit is due, and would like to provide this list of third party libraries that the VCF uses
GTK2 - The backend library used as the basis for the Linux port.
FreeImage - Graphics library that supports a wide variety of image formats
STL - The C++ Standard Template Library
PCRE - Perl Compatible Regular Expressions -
Regexx -
Anti Grain Geometry - A superb 2D rendering library for vector paths.
Scintilla - A syntax highlighting text editor component, used for the VCF Builder's text editor.
